ERROR.MIN-OPTIONS: You must select at least {{value}} options.
ERROR.MAX-OPTIONS: You can select no more than {{value}} options.
ERROR.MIN-TOTAL-QUANTITY: You must have a total of {{value}} options.
ERROR.MAX-TOTAL-QUANTITY: You can select no more than a total of {{value}} options.

CART.TOO_MANY_ATTEMPTS: An item in your cart could not be priced. Please try removing an item / items and try again.

CONSTRAINT_RULE.ASSOCIATE_AND_APPLY: An error ocurred getting the constraint rules for your cart.

ASSETS.TERMINATE_SUCCESS: The asset termination has been added to your cart.
ASSETS.RENEW_SUCCESS: The asset renewal has been added to your cart.
